message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product is truly a game-changer and I believe it's worth every penny of its $8,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $7,200. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your experience and productivity. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
